name: chill island
description:
Touhou fangame made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 8. Cirno finds herself on an island where her friends don't recognize her, everyone's acting weird, and she's constantly melting.

This is really more like a proof of concept and/or the beginning of a longer thing  vs. a complete experience. If you've done the broom quest, you've done it all. But, who knows? Maybe you'll find narrative fulfillment in sweeping the floor.

As a heads up, the (lack of) transition between the dark menu and light backgrounds can be sort of jarring, and I didn't have time to sort it out before the deadline.

Features:

  • adventure game with light RPG/survival elements
  • three (3) discrete Touhou characters to interact with
  • a few odd jobs to complete
  • crafting that involves slamming two objects together with no guidance and hoping for the best
  • general melting ice cream sort of vibe
  • graphics at different low resolutions coexisting in perfect visual harmony
  • I even did music this time lol

Credits:

  • pontifus: art, text, music/sound, rpgmaker stuff

More credits:

  • Touhou Project: ZUN/Team Shanghai Alice
  • RMMZ plugins: VisuStella Team, Galv, MechPen
  • Some cc0 or royalty free audio clips; some SFX come from a kronbits asset pack
  • Font: Tentown by ChevyRay
  •  Color palette based on Grape Soda by Braquen
